keyFacts: The email shows coordination between a federal prosecutor and an FBI agent in December 2018 regarding the Epstein case.
The communication indicates active preparation for a legal event scheduled for Wednesday, December 12, 2018.
The tone suggests ongoing investigative or prosecutorial work related to the Epstein matter at that time.
